game.name: Tropico 4: The Academy
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, Steam 도전 과제, Steam 트레이딩 카드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Due to a budget SNAFU (for which Penultimo is not responsible), the remote island of Isla Guerra is revolting against El Presidente’s regime. Tropico needs to recruit skilled cadets via the new East Point Academy and prepare for a large scale assault by an invading enemy army.
